cufy.text.json

Class JSONConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cufy.convert.AbstractConverter
      • cufy.convert.BaseConverter
        • cufy.text.json.JSONConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Converter

    public class JSONConverter
extends BaseConverter
    A converter that supports everything in the BaseConverter. This converter supports the conversion between String and other Objects. Using JSON.
    Since:
    25-Jan-2020
    Version:
    0.1.3
    Author:
    lsafer

      • objectToString

        protected void objectToString(ConvertToken<java.lang.Object,java.lang.String> token)
        Set the ConvertToken.output with a new String that holds the value of the given ConvertToken.input. Using JSON.
        Overrides:
        objectToString in class BaseConverter
        Parameters:
        token - the conversion instance that holds the variables of this conversion
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given 'token' is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given 'outputClass' is not String

      • stringToObject

        protected void stringToObject(ConvertToken<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> token)
        Try to construct a new object of the value of the given ConvertToken.input with type of the ConvertToken.outputClazz. Using JSON.
        Overrides:
        stringToObject in class BaseConverter
        Parameters:
        token - the conversion instance that holds the variables of this conversion
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given 'token' or 'input' is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given 'input' is not a string. Or if the 'inputClass' is not String.class.
